description: According to the few remaining “old-timers” in the town of Frederick, from sunrise to sunset, hundreds of thousands of ducks, geese, cranes, blackbirds and shorebirds congregated at Hackberry Flat before it was drained in the early 1900s.

name: Great Plains Trail - Hackberry Flat Loop
